DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine ibuprofen 50mg/g gel effective safety treat patient muscle ache , joint pain due sprain , bruise , tendinitis myofascial compare Profenid 25mg/g gel .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Efficacy Safety Ibuprofen 50 mg/g Gel Compared Profenid 25mg/g Gel
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective study evaluate efficacy ibuprofen 50 mg/g gel treatment patient muscle , joint pain cause sprain , contusion , tendinitis , myofascial compare Profenid 25mg/g gel .
DOC.criteria: Patients sex , race , age 12 year ; Ability read , understand sign Informed Consent case minor monitor consent parent ; Complaint clinical muscle pain , joint pain cause sprain , contusion , tendonitis , myofascial ; Score 4 VAS symptom review : Pain ; Patients able understand follow protocol trial . Patients without ligament injury ligament injury partial incomplete Known hypersensitivity component formula , medication comparative test ; Hypersensitivity acetylsalicylic acid ; Hypersensitivity ketoprofen , ibuprofen antiinflammatory steroid ; Hypersensitivity acetaminophen ; Skin change pathological site application , eczema acne , infect skin wound ; Pregnant lactate woman . Patients require surgery immobilization ; Patients fracture ligament rupture ; Patients take anticoagulant ; Patients decompensated concomitant systemic disease , diabetes , congenital acquire blood disorder , convulsive disorder , autoimmune disease , renal failure , severe infection , hormonal disorder pulmonary disorder ; Use NSAIDs , corticosteroid venotherapics , thread form administration ; History alcoholism substance abuse ; Conditions opinion investigator make patient unsuitable participate study .
